TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExtensionDataObject extends System.Object

remarks.para: The is the structure that stores extra data encountered by the during deserialization operations. The structure is used by serialization to write the extra data into the serialized instance. The structure is returned by the property of the interface.

summary.para: Stores data from a versioned data contract that has been extended by adding new members.
